attributes.action: ban the use of Dihydrogen Monoxide, a dangerous chemical known to be responsible for many millions of  deaths worldwide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dihydrogen Monoxide is unsafe in any form. As a liquid, inhalation of even a small amount can be fatal. Prolonged exposure to the solid form causes
severe tissue damage. In gas form, it can cause severe burns. It is commonly found in biopsies of tumours. It is also a huge threat to the environment, forming a key component of acid rain and is a major greenhouse gas.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
